content.text:
# 41st TCA Awards

The 41st TCA Awards were announced on August 20, 2025. The nominees were announced by the Television Critics Association on July 9, 2025.
Winners and nominees
{| class="wikitable"
|-
! style="background:#EEDD82;"| Category
! style="background:#EEDD82;"| Winner
! style="background:#EEDD82;"| Nominees
|-
| style="background: #ececec; color: grey; vertical-align: middle; text-align: center;" class="table-na" | Program of the Year
| style="text-align: center;"| The Pitt (HBO Max)
|
* Adolescence (Netflix)
* Andor (Disney+)
* Hacks (HBO Max)
* The Rehearsal (HBO)
* Severance (Apple TV+)
* The Studio (Apple TV+)
* The White Lotus (HBO)
|-

|

* Hacks (HBO Max)
* Nobody Wants This (Netflix)
* The Rehearsal (HBO)
